name: Automatic Profiles
description: Lightweight app that automatically can manage the following of the phones settings based on the location and/or time: Ring mode, Wifi mode, Bluetooth and Flight mode.  Using the app you can e.g. make sure that Wifi gets activated when coming home or that the phone gets muted and only vibration is active when at work.  The free version allows creating up to two profiles. Via in-app purchase you can upgrade to the full version, which allows more profiles to be added. App permissions required for location, wifi, autostart & bluetooth access.
